void AccountsData::updateAccount (  const Q_UINT16  key,
const QString  id,
const QString  desc
) 
 

Update an account.

This function updates an existing account or inserts a new account if the "key" is not found in the account database. Requires an identifying key, and the new data.

Note:
This update does not work on the retained earnings account. Use AccountsData::updateREAccount() instead.

Definition at line 202 of file accountsData.cpp.

References accountsChanged(), accountsVec, AccountsData::Account::desc, AccountsData::Account::id, and saveToDisk().

Referenced by AccountsTable::updateDb().

00206     {
00207         Account *account = new Account;
00208         account->id = id;
00209         account->desc = desc;
00210         accountsVec.push_back(account);
00211     }
00212     else  // update existing entry
00213     {
00214         Account *account = accountsVec[key-1];
00215         account->id = id;
00216         account->desc = desc;
00217     }
00218 
00219     emit saveToDisk();
00220 
00221     emit accountsChanged();
00222 }

void AccountsData::deleteAccount (  const Q_UINT16  key  ) 
 

Delete an account.

Requires an identifying key

Note:
If the account contains associated data in the journal or journal entry it will not be deleted. Use AccountsData::accountHasEntries() to check for this condition (and tell the user).

Definition at line 224 of file accountsData.cpp.

Changes the Retained Earnings account description.
